A

Access - Interface in org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api
Validate permissions based on URIs for agents, objects and rights.
AccessImpl - Class in org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol
This class fetches permission data from a Web Service and validates permissions based on such ACL information.

AccessImpl(Model) - Constructor for class org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.AccessImpl
A contructor where a pre-exisiting Model containing permissions can be supplied.

P

Permission - Enum in org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.api
Permission levels defined by http://www.w3.org/wiki/WebAccessControl and extended for PLAY by reusing publish/subscribe vocabulary from https://www.oasis-open.org/committees/wsn/.
